This has been in the works for several weeks, and we're thrilled to have them join the team. Barret will report to me; Luke and Sam will report into Barret. More to come on what they'll focus on soon!

items.summary:
LEGO Botanicals Japanese Red Maple Bonsai Tree set

Buy for $50 (Reg. $60)

What we love

LEGO Botanicals has been quite the popular theme and for good reason, as they come with some elegant brickwork that only adds to your home décor, and this newer Japanese Red Maple Bonsai Tree is one of the most striking. After all 474 pieces have been used, it stands over 9.5 inches tall and would make an excellent gift for others or yourself – all without ever needing the upkeep of a real plant.

We are getting the first chances in 2026 to save on Apple’s value-packed current-generation M4 Mac mini this week. The base model is now starting down at $499 shipped, but we also wanted to highlight the more mid-range 16GB model with the upgraded internal storage – the 256GB setups are starting to fall out of favor in a big way it would seem and this 512GB option is sitting at one of its best prices.

items.title: Just $23 gets you Anker’s Soundcore Select 4 Go Bluetooth speaker today (34% off)
items.summary:
Anker Soundcore Select 4 Go Bluetooth Speaker

Buy for $23 (Reg. $35)

What we love

This is one of the more compact speakers out there, which can comfortably fit in the palm of your hand. This one also has a built-in loop for clipping it onto bags or gear. Despite its size, this speaker promises up to 20 hours of battery life, and you can pair two units together for stereo sound.

items.title: Convert level 1 or 2 NACS chargers to fit J1772 EVs with this Schumacher adapter at $71
items.summary:
Schumacher NACS to J1772 EV Charger Adapter

Buy for $71 (Reg. $80)

What we love

Folks who drive EVs with J1772 connections may sometimes find themselves surrounded by NACS connectors – whether at relatives’ homes, charging stations, and more. With the adapter you can save yourself the headache by adapting any level 1 or level 2 NACS charge gun to fit your J1772 EV – plus, it’s nice and compact for stowing away in your glovebox, so you’ll always have it at the ready.

Amazon is offering the EGO POWER+ 56V 16-inch Cordless Chain Saw with a 2.5Ah battery at $249 shipped, which is all the sweeter considering it’s coming in $18 under the 12-inch counterpart with a 2.5Ah battery. This larger chainsaw package has been keeping to its $279 full price since Black Friday/Cyber Monday pricing ended, with the last year having seen it gone as low as $219 a few times, and $208 once with some Prime exclusive savings during October’s Prime Day event. While it may not be the lowest price we have seen, you’re still getting a solid $30 markdown that lands things at the third-lowest price we have tracked since 2025 began.

This 3-in-1 charging station can handle your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods in one compact setup with a Qi2-certified 15W charging pad for iPhone, a built-in Apple Watch puck, and a wireless pad for earbuds. The highlight here is the LED-lit base with five color options, giving it a soft ambient glow. This versatile charging solution is worth considering if you’re ready to swap out the usual chargers for something a bit more stylish and functional on your desk or nightstand.

items.summary:

This is regularly a $420 display, which is currently fetching $400 at Samsung’s online store. Today’s 52% discount at Amazon shaves $220 off its usual going rate, $200 below Samsung’s price. This is one of the lowest prices we have tracked for this display, and it’s now within $30 of its all-time low from when it hit $170 around the same time last year. It’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to pick up a 4K monitor for your workstation, and you can learn more about it below.
